pageProduct.name: Sustagen Hospital Active + Fibre 840g Vanilla
pageProduct.description:
General Information

SUSTAGEN Hospital Formula Plus Fibre is a nutritionally complete supplement packed with a comprehensive range of vitamins and minerals, plus it's high in protein to help keep you strong and active and has the added benefit of fibre.

Eating a balanced diet is important at any age, however a busy lifestyle or poor eating habits can sometimes mean you're not meeting your recommended nutrition needs. So, it's great to know there's help available with SUSTAGEN Hospital Formula Plus Fibre.

Whether you want to support your health or ensure you have the energy you need to keep active simply mix SUSTAGEN Hospital Formula Plus Fibre with water for a boost of essential nutrients:
- High in fibre to support digestive function
- High protein: 13.8g per serve to support muscle health
- Immune support with Vitamins A, B6, B12, C, D, folate and minerals copper, selenium, iron, and zinc.
- Supports energy function: high in Magnesium & Iron
- Strong and healthy bones: high in calcium and Vitamin D 

In addition, SUSTAGEN Hospital Formula Plus Fibre is gluten free, low in fat and low GI for sustained energy.

Available in two delicious flavours:
- Chocolate flavour
- Vanilla flavour

*GI = 42 (Chocolate flavour)
*GI = 45 (Vanilla flavour)

SUSTAGEN Hospital Formula is a formulated meal replacement and cannot be used as a total diet replacement. Consume as part of a varied and balanced diet and healthy lifestyle.

Suitable For: Vegetarian Diet and Halal

Product Claims: Glycemic Index © ® of GI symbol, The University of Sydney, used under licence, Good source of Vitamin D, Low GI - 45, High in fibre, Gluten free, Contains Lactose, High in protein, High in Calcium, free from artificial Colours.

Lifestyle Claim: Vegetarian| Gluten Free| Halal

Size: 840g

Flavour: VANILLA

Serving Size: 60g (Ave Qty per serve + 200mL water)

Servings Per Pack: 14

Warnings

Not suitable for children below 4 years of age
Formulated Meal Replacement. Nutritionally Complete.

Ingredients

Non Fat Milk Solids (62%), Corn Syrup Solids, Guar Gum (Partially Hydrolysed), Whole Milk Powder, Sugar, Minerals (Magnesium
Hydrogen Phosphate, Ferric Pyrophosphate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gulconate, Manganese Sulphate, Sodium Molydate, Chromium Trichloride, Sodium Selenite), Vitamins (C, E, Niacinamide, A, D3, B6, B1, B2, Folic Acid, K1, B12), Stabiliser (414), Flavour.
Contains Milk. May contain Soy. Gluten Free.

Contains: Milk

Allergen Contains: Milk

Allergen May Be Present: Soy

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Gluten

Directions

Opening/Resealing Instructions:
To open, remove cap and foil seal. After opening can, replace lid firmly and store in cool dry place. Keep the can tightly closed and use within 4 weeks after
opening.

PREPARATION INSTRUCTIONS

Mix 3 level scoops* with 200ml water or milk (depending on taste).
Use enclosed scoop * 1 x scoop of SUSTAGEN = 20g.
Stir before serving. Great chilled or served warm.
Note: Do not change proportions. Follow feeding instructions.
All prepared product should be tightly covered and consumed within 4 hours at room temperature or within 24 hours if refrigerated.
Keep the can tightly closed. Store in a cool dry place
For RECIPIES visit www.sustagen.com.au
Recommended consumption 2 serves per day.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Keep the can tightly closed.
Store in a cool dry place and use within 4 weeks after opening.
Powder may settle during transportation.
Best Before/Lot: See base of the can.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recycle Can, Cap, Spoon. Foil - Make into ball.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
